vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Βαλαάμ, ὁ, indecl. (Heb. בִּלְעָם), as in LXX (FlJ has ὁ βάλαμος);
Balaam (Num.22-24): 2Pe.2:15, Ju 11, Rev.2:14.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Balaam, [possibly] "Baal [lord] of the people" or "the clan brings forth"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.22.5;
son of: Beor (H1160H)
§ Balaam, [possibly] "Baal [lord] of the people" or "the clan brings forth"
Balaam, (Proper name), indeclinable
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴蘭 意思是 "或許"
1) 舊約的一個先知,在新約被視為欺騙與假先知的代表
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴兰 意思是 "或许"
1) 旧约的一个先知,在新约被视为欺骗与假先知的代表
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ba-la-am « theo đường của Ba-anh » Xem H1109
